author: terencechain
content: Has anyone tried syncing devnet0 since Wednesday? Both full cgc node or low cgc node. For low cgc, it's hard to find the peers that have your subnets. For full cgc node, blob by range request consistently timeout, I'm checking whether it's a prysm issue or not

author: manunlp
content: I tried on Friday with Prysm (both super node and full node) it worked

author: manunlp
content: My node needed maybe 3-4 days of data. So it was not from Genesis
